subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Out of the N.F.L., Jeremy Bloom is returning to the United States team to revive his freestyle career in time for the Vancouver Olympics. Bloom, 26, announced he was returning to the American team this week for its annual fall camp. Bloom traveled to Switzerland last month, where he was on skis for the first time since ending his freestyle career after the Turin Olympics.
